customer_reference.description: A customer-specified reference number for customer bookkeeping purposes

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

support_key.description: A key to reference this porting order when contacting Telnyx customer support. This information is not available in draft porting orders.

parent_support_key.description: A key to reference for the porting order group when contacting Telnyx customer support. This information is not available for porting orders in `draft` state

porting_phone_numbers_count.description: Count of phone numbers associated with this porting order

phone_number_type.description: The type of the phone number

description.description: A description of the porting order

requirements.description: List of documentation requirements for porting numbers. Can be set directly or via the `requirement_group_id` parameter.

requirements_met.description: Is true when the required documentation is met

user_id.description: Identifies the user (or organization) who requested the porting order

record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.
